channel.title: mercurial on Bikulov Octonotes
channel.description: Recent content in mercurial on Bikulov Octonotes

item.title: Set application version in gengetopt config based on Mercurial revision
item.description:
Previously I wrote about gengetopt tool to parse command line arguments. There was a line about application version.

version "13.10.25"

It is important to keep this line up to date every time you compile and deploy binary.

item.title: Setting up RhodeCode on Ubuntu 12.04
item.description: This howto is based on a great guide with modifications. All settings are made for server domain hg.kenarius.org. You can replace it with your one easily.
